attributes.action: Prevent the Premier League from destroying the national sport by forcing clubs to play regular games abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CEO of the Premier League believes that money is much more important than ensuring the traditions of our national game and so has decided to explore the option of playing regular Premier League games abroad.

The media are skewing the opinion of the public due to the monopoly Rupert Murdoch has over all types of medium and again it is beneficial to him as it means more money for the Australian.

We need the Culture minister to enforce that the Premier League listen to true fans and stop this ridiculous notion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
